title: Love, Bewitched & Branded
description: This Beauty and the Beast retelling takes a new twist on the tale, with LGBTQ elements. Areum and her sisters have come down in the world after their father's business misfortunes. They move to a small village that is linked to the mysterious Mantic Manor, where an alleged witch and her creature live. No one has been to the house in several years until Areum's father stumbles upon the home when seeking shelter. Caught stealing a single rose for his eldest daughter, Areum's father must send his daughter to take his place to pay for his theft. There she meets a beast, and a mysterious woman, who is more than she seems. Â Will Areum be able to break the curse, or will the curse consume her as well?
author: Aerona Darcy Cullen
